About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

As a customer service professional with strong communication and problem-solving skills, I am currently transitioning into a career in web development. I recently completed an online course in HTML and CSS and am currently enrolled in a junior web development bootcamp where I am learning more about HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. In addition to my training, I have been building projects on GitHub to further develop my skills and demonstrate my ability to work independently. As I continue on my journey I'm committed to keep learning new frameworks and technologies to stay updated in the development world.
